templates.name: Cancel/edit order
templates.content: I can check if that's possible! Can I have your full name, email, order number, phone number, and your zip code please?

templates.name: Do you have expedited shipping?
templates.content:
Glad you asked! We offer a next-day delivery for $23. It arrives the next day if the order is placed by 12 PM EST. Orders placed Monday-Friday before 12 PM EST will begin processing that day (excluding holidays). Orders placed after 12 PM EST will begin processing the next business day.

Orders placed after 12 PM EST on Friday will be processed the following Monday.

templates.name: Can I order online and pick up in-store?
templates.content: Absolutely, check out how it works here - https://samedelman.attn.tv/sl/EGC2Ip2s

templates.name: Retroactive discount request
templates.content: I'll be more than happy to check on this with my team for you! Can I have your full name, email, order number, phone number, zip code, and the discount that you wish to apply?

templates.name: Escalation template
templates.content: Can I have your full name, email, order number, phone number and your zip code please?

templates.name: Start / Initiate return
templates.content: You can start your return/exchange here: https://samedelman.happyreturns.com/

templates.name: Phone Support
templates.content: You can give us a call at (888) 889-9609 (M-F 9am-6pm & Sat 10am-5pm CT) or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://samedelman.attn.tv/sl/7nit6Sn5

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to contact us via this link: https://samedelman.custhelp.com/app/ask Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Social Media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/sam_edelman/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/SamEdelmanOfficial/

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that but if it helps, you can check out the items we have on sale here: https://www.samedelman.com/sale?icid=TopNav_Sale

templates.name: Order update / status / tracking
templates.content: You can use our convenient online tool to see the latest updates on your order: https://www.samedelman.com/track-order#Track%20Order

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Our processing time takes 1-2 business days and once shipped, it will take 3-7 business days for domestic orders and up to 18 business days for international orders.

templates.name: Sizing
templates.content: Happy to help! I recommend checking out our size guide to find the best fit: https://samedelman.attn.tv/sl/v3cJnu6O If you're still unsure, just let me know!

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to contact us via this link: https://samedelman.custhelp.com/app/ask Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship / affiliate program
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at social@samedelman.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: You can find us near you here: https://www.samedelman.com/stores?icid=Footer_Info_Stores

templates.name: How can I check my gift card balance?
templates.content: You can check your gift card balance at the following link: https://www.samedelman.com/gift-card-balance

templates.name: Do you have a student discount?
templates.content: Yes! You can learn more and apply for your discount here: https://www.samedelman.com/studentbeans

templates.name: Do you ship to P.O. boxes or APO/FPO addresses?
templates.content: We cannot deliver to P.O. boxes or to military APO/FPO addresses. We apologize for any inconvenience.

templates.name: Do you offer exchanges?
templates.content: Yes, exchanges can be made for the same item or a different color item within the same product group for an equal or lower price. Please note that we cannot process exchanges for other styles. We recommend submitting a return for a refund so you can place a new order for the item you want.

templates.name: Can I use a coupon on a sale item?
templates.content: Absolutely! Our coupons can be stacked with items on sale.

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free ground shipping on all domestic orders over $99.00. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum? Also, keep in mind that Sam Edelman Loyalty members will receive free shipping on all orders when logged in.

templates.name: Size Chart: All - Clothes
templates.content: You can take a look at our size chart here: https://www.samedelman.com/customer-service/sizing-and-product-care

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://www.samedelman.com/sale?icid=TopNav_Sale_All

templates.name: Rewards / referral
templates.content: We have a loyalty program that offers special perks. Check it out here: https://www.samedelman.com/loyalty
